Founders & Leadership

  • Founders: Z.ai was co-founded by Tang Jie and Li Juanzi. The company began as a spin-out from Tsinghua University before becoming an independent Beijing-based AI firm (Wikipedia).

  • Key Executive: The current CEO of Z.ai is Zhang Peng, who appears to be leading the strategic direction and product development (including releases like GLM-4.5 and its various capabilities) (Wikipedia).
